Lectures.Title: L1: Character Creation
Lectures.Description: The lecture introduced the course and created the vampire characters.

Lectures.Title: L2: Halloween
Lectures.Description: This lecture told the story of Halloween from the characters point of view.

Lectures.Title: L3: Cold War
Lectures.Description: The players joined the Cold War on the side of the USSR.

Lectures.Title: L4: Star Wars
Lectures.Description: The players saw the release of the original Star Wars movie.

Lectures.Title: L5: Less Movies, More TV
Lectures.Description: The players lamented the advent of Netflix.

Labs.Title: Lab 1: Create a backstory
Labs.Description: Lab 1 was about creating a backstory for characters.

Labs.Title: Lab 2: Watch a Movie
Labs.Description: Lab 2 involved students watching a movie at home. Any movie.
